rows.label: tlk45300054_03_msg0001
rows.name:
The Superbia Divine Beast's life is running
out, everybody knows it.

rows.label: tlk45300054_03_msg0002
rows.name:
My dad tells me that when he was
a boy, there was much less steam
hanging in the air around here.

rows.label: tlk45300054_03_msg0003
rows.name:
As a Divine Beast's death draws closer,
the surface temperature of its body
starts to rise.

rows.label: tlk45300054_03_msg0004
rows.name:
Apparently it's hotter this month
than it was the last, even.

rows.label: tlk45300054_03_msg0005
rows.name:
You have to wonder how much longer
this whole place will hold out.
